text: Paper accepted at ICLR 2025: "Robust Alignment of Large Language Models through Constitutional AI"
Invited to speak at the AI Safety Workshop at ICML 2025
Released code and dataset for our multi-agent reinforcement learning framework
Started as a visiting researcher at Your Partner Institution
Paper on interpretable decision-making accepted at UAI 2025
Awarded the Young Researcher Grant for AI Safety research
Presented our work on LLM robustness at the AI Alignment Conference
New preprint available: "Scaling Laws for Constitutional AI Training"
